ANIME_DESCRIÃ‡ÃƒO:
Anime Commands:
**`{{prefix}}`aniquote**
â¯ Generate a random anime quote.
**`{{prefix}}`anitoday**
â¯ Displays the list of anime currently airing for today's date.

â¯ Generates a random anime recommendation. Recommends a Hentai if used on a nsfw channel.
**`{{prefix}}`anime**
â¯ Searches for a specific anime in <:MyAnimeList:827773575112425472> [MyAnimeList](https://myanimelist.net 'Homepage').

â¯ Search for various animes belonging to the search term. Maximum of 10 results.

â¯ Finds user profile on myanimelist based on the provided query.

**`{{prefix}}`animeme**
â¯ Generate an anime meme fetched from selected <:reddit:838088411399061504> [Subreddits](https://reddit.com 'Homepage'). Include 'reload' parameter to reload meme cache. Memes generated are in order by default, add 'r', 'random', or 'randomize' to randomize meme.

**`{{prefix}}`nextep**

**`{{prefix}}`anitop**
â¯ Search one of the best anime on MyAnimeList.net or return a random one.

Moderation Commands:
**`{{prefix}}`addroleall**
â¯ Adds a role to all users of the server at once.

â¯ Remove warnings from a user.

â¯ Deletes a certain amount of messages.
**`{{prefix}}`warn**
â¯ Warn a user.
**`{{prefix}}`warnings**
â¯ Display number of warnings a user has.
**`{{prefix}}`ban**
â¯ Ban a user.
**`{{prefix}}`banlist**
â¯ Displays the server's banned list.
**`{{prefix}}`invite-tracker**
â¯ Displays invitation records of a user.
**`{{prefix}}`lockdown**
â¯ Locks a channel for a specified time.
**`{{prefix}}`deafen**
â¯ Deafen a user.
**`{{prefix}}`unban**
â¯ Unban a user.

**`{{prefix}}`unlock**

â¯ Kick a user.

â¯ Clears all messages in a channel at once.

AJUDA4:
__**Useful links:**__ [Privacy policy](https://hopebot.top/privacy-policy) | [Status](https://hopebot.top/status) | [Become a Partner](https://hopebot.top/news/become-a-partner) | [Website](https://hopebot.top/)

Welcome to Hope's **help** menu!

You can click the __blue button__ to access Hope's **command list** here on the *Discord*, or click [right here](https://hopebot.top/commands) to visit the **command list** on Hope's *Website*.

If you want to access Hope's **ADDONS**, just click on the __green button__, and you can also set them up through Hope's *Dashboard* [by clicking here](https://hopebot.top/dashboard/{{guildid}})!
AJUDA6: Found a bug? or a command that you believe is not working correctly? Use `{{prefix}}bug <message>` to report to my developer!
AJUDA8: Tell everyone what you think of Hope with the `{{prefix}}feedback` command
AJUDA10: Join our [support server](https://discord.com/invite/RC5dmwVapP) if you need help, want to get information about updates and issues or want to offer contributions to Hope!
AJUDA12: Use the `{{prefix}}vote` command to vote for Hope and receive amazing rewards!
AJUDA14: Invite Hope to your server [by clicking here]({{invite}}) and make it a SUPER COOL SERVER.
AJUDA15: Ah! And Thank You for allowing me to be a part of your amazing server <3
